vendor_name: Hôtel Le Louis Versailles Château - MGallery Collection
title: MGallery Chateau Luxury Moments from Palace of Versailles with Daily Breakfast
description: Experience the regal elegance of France's royal past with a stylish stay ideally positioned in the heart of Versailles. Part of the exclusive MGallery portfolio, everything you want from a glamorous rendezvous can be found at this iconic address, just a 10-minute walk from the grandeur of the UNESCO World-Heritage Palace of Versailles and the magnificent Versailles Gardens. After days exploring the city, cap off your evening with craft cocktails and traditional French cuisine at L'Alcove Bar and Restaurant, or retreat to the hotel's 24-hour hammam or sauna.
location_description: Hotel Le Louis Versailles Château - MGallery
offer_address: 2 Bis Avenue de Paris, 78000 Versailles, France

vendor_name: Hôtel Le Louis Versailles Château - MGallery Collection
title: Luminous Heritage Versailles Escape Minutes from the Palace with Onsite Restaurant
description:
Just steps from the magnificent Palace of Versailles, this contemporary hotel is tucked away right in the city's sweet spot. The elegant rooms and suites offer the perfect place to retreat after exploring Versailles' treasures, each with plush bedding, Nespresso coffee machines and Clarins bath products. Enjoy classic French cuisine at L'Alcôve restaurant, or relax with a drink overlooking historic views on La Terrassee, the hotel's sunny jewel.

Spend days palace-hopping, browsing artisan local markets, or getting lost in the knockout Palace's gardens, before returning to Hôtel Le Louis Versailles Château - MGallery to rest and recover in the wellness space, complete with hammam, sauna and sensorial shower.
location_description: Hôtel Le Louis Versailles Château - MGallery Collection
offer_address: 2 Bis Avenue de Paris, Versailles 78000, France
